text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Happy birthday dude!! I made sure to get you a present.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: You’re always going on about how busy you are with research even skipping meals, right? So I got you this candy called Oligo something――

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oho, oligosaccharide candy!! Wonderful, Pokke!! Giving me oligosaccharides at a time like this!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Actually I’m doing a comparative study right now on whether taking sweets or indulgences or not affects the Umamusume’s mental and physical data.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: For making a parfait‐flavored supplement I need tons of sugar but shopping is a pain. If I deconstruct this candy and use it――

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Huh? You are… using the thing someone gave you for experiments?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah, don’t get so worked up. If I have this, I can recreate parfait flavor!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oligosaccharides go well with Western sweets, are low digestibility and have gut‐regulating effects, perfect stuff. So come on, don’t look so scary and offer me that candy――

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: You’re saying the candy becomes parfait, right!? That’s freakin’ awesome!! Yo, let me try some too!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Your emotions… they’re a little questionable honestly.
